archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection consists of an advertisement from the Lowenback Brothers liquor distributors in Alexandria, Virginia, c.1910s.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Lowenbach Brothers Price List must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Lowenbach Brothers Price List, Ms2012-006, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was purchased by Special Collections in February 2012.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Lowenbach Brothers Price List was completed in May 2012.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of an advertisement from the Lowenbach Brothers liquor distributors in Alexandria, Virginia, c.1910s. The flyer includes pricing for a range of liquors and spirits, apparently all mail order.
